body.p: Short‑term employee benefits include items such as the following, if expected to be settled wholly before twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services:

li.p: wages, salaries and social security contributions;
paid annual leave and paid sick leave;
non‑monetary benefits (such as medical care, housing, cars and free or subsidised goods or services) for current employees.
